copyright.title: License
copyright.content: Data was collected by Penguin Statistics, licensed under a Creative Commons Attribution-NonCommercial 4.0 International License. In case of redistribution and transformation towards the material, you must give appropriate credit, provide a link to the license, indicate if changes were made, and may not use the material for commercial purposes.

development.title: Preview Build
development.description: You are currently browsing the development build

contribute.contribute_0: If you have experience with any of the following, and want to contribute to Penguin Statistics, contact us at QQ group: 747099627.
contribute.contribute_1: This is a nonprofit and open source project

skills.backend: Back End Development (Java Spring Boot, MongoDB)

failed.title: Failed to fetch resources
failed.subtitle: Unable to establish synchronized connection with neural network. Missing partial or all resources.

continue.first: Are you sure you want to submit this record?

contact.before: If you are sure you got this drop in-game, submit this report and
contact.after: Please indicate the stage name and drops. A screenshot is preferred for verification purposes. Our team will mark your report appropiately after verifying it.

causes.limitation: Your current submission has a large deviation from our existing data. This submission could be marked as a false report, removing it from our data set.

type.gte: Should have at least {quantity} kinds of items
type.lte: Should have at most {quantity} kinds of items
type.not: Should not be {quantity} kinds of items

global.notification: For performance concerns, we recommend you to use the global site {0}.

cn.notification: For performance concerns, we recommend you to use the CN mirror site {0}.

ignore.title: Ignore Mirror Notification?
ignore.subtitle: Are you sure you want to ignore all mirror optimization notifications? Performance issues may occur.

lowData.title: Low Data Mode
lowData.subtitle: Low Data Mode will stop fetching nonessential resources, such as the zone backgrounds in stage selector and the website background, to help reduce network data use.

reset.title: Reset All
reset.subtitle: This operation will delete all local data and settings you have set. After the deletion, all settings will be reset to default, all data needs to be downloaded again, and the web page will be reloaded. Are you sure to continue?

upgrade.title: Version Outdated
upgrade.subtitle: The current client version has outdated due to upgrade. Please retry after upgrade
